short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered context menu for ChatGPT, Claude, & Perplexity. Analyze YouTube videos, support RTL text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your browsing with AI-powered context menu options. 
RightClickPrompt send selected text to ChatGPT, Claude, or Perplexity AI. 
Features: 
- Summerization
- Transaltion
- Language support: Hebrew, English
- YouTube integration for video content analysis
- RTL text support
- Perfect for research, learning, and content creation.
